intent: Create a practical 5-day Kyoto itinerary focused on temples, culture, and food

success_criteria.primary: Itinerary is followable â€” a tourist could actually use it
success_criteria.secondary: Recommendations align with stated interests and budget

must_include: At least 3 temple/shrine visits (this is Kyoto)
Practical logistics (how to get between places)
locations_should_be_real: Fushimi Inari, Kinkaku-ji, Gion, Arashiyama are expected
Restaurant/food recommendations should be plausible (not invented names)
must_avoid: Impossible schedules (e.g., 5 temples + 3 museums in one day)
Ignoring stated interests (no temples, only shopping)

quality_rubric.feasibility: Travel times between locations are realistic
quality_rubric.interest_alignment: Emphasizes temples, culture, food as requested
quality_rubric.budget_fit: Moderate budget = mid-range hotels, local restaurants, not hostels or luxury ryokans
quality_rubric.local_knowledge: Shows awareness of Kyoto specifics (temple hours, seasonal considerations)
quality_rubric.practical_tips: Includes helpful logistics (transport passes, booking advice)
